chunk-33911236aa6107381f93f86f33327320.description: The Oglala Sioux Tribe, also known as the Lakota, is a Native American tribe to which cultural objects and belongings were returned after more than a century. These items, including moccasins, sacred pipes, ritual clothing, and beaded leather bags, were believed to have been taken from Wounded Knee after the 1890 massacre and were kept in the Founders Museum in Barre, Mass.

The United States, referred to as the U.S., is the country where the Lakota cultural objects were kept before being returned to the Oglala Sioux Tribe. It is also involved in supporting Ukraine's military efforts by preparing to ship artillery rounds and rockets through NATO.

Bakhmut is the eastern city in Ukraine where the Ukrainian military is engaged in an intense bombardment, raising concerns about ammunition supply for future campaigns. The city is a focal point of the current military conflict, with the Pentagon expressing concerns about the unsustainable pace of artillery shell firing.

chunk-6a6dca492cdaad913d5de757b6b6fe0e.description: The Ukrainian counteroffensive is an event where Ukraine is attempting to regain lost territory with support from the United States and Britain, who are preparing to ship thousands of NATO and Soviet-type artillery rounds and rockets to help shore up supplies for the offensive.

Eleven of the largest U.S. banks, including JPMorgan Chase, Bank of America, Wells Fargo, and Citigroup, came together to inject $30 billion into First Republic Bank to prevent its collapse following the implosion of Silicon Valley Bank. This extraordinary effort was aimed at staving off financial contagion and reassuring the stability of the American financial system.

The Biden administration is preparing to impose new rules to restrict or ban an array of toxic chemicals widely used in manufacturing, presenting a balance between economic agenda and public health. This regulation faces opposition from industries such as chip makers, the electric vehicle industry, and military contractors, who argue it could hinder the administration's drive to nurture the American economy, while public health groups advocate for regulation to protect workers and communities from health risks.

chunk-6a6dca492cdaad913d5de757b6b6fe0e.entity_name: Social Studies Curriculum Review in Florida
chunk-6a6dca492cdaad913d5de757b6b6fe0e.description: The review and approval of social studies curriculum in Florida has become a contentious political issue, with Gov. Ron DeSantis leading a campaign against what he describes as 'woke indoctrination' in public schools. The state is scrutinizing curriculum content, including flagging anything that could hint at critical race theory, as part of Gov. DeSantis's efforts.

chunk-ce5e77442d8a01e24524144690ba295e.description: A combative young Republican group in New York, known for being Trump-friendly and wary of the GOP's moderate path.

chunk-ce5e77442d8a01e24524144690ba295e.entity_name: INTERNATIONAL A4-9 Anger After Migrant Tragedy
chunk-ce5e77442d8a01e24524144690ba295e.description: An event referring to a sinking that killed 86 migrants, sparking a debate in Italy about responsibility.
source_entities: INTERNATIONAL A4-9 ANGER AFTER MIGRANT TRAGEDY

chunk-ce5e77442d8a01e24524144690ba295e.description: An event where the former president's campaign plans to accuse Alvin Bragg of political bias if criminal charges are faced.
An event or exhibition, part of WEEKEND ARTS, featuring Kehinde Wiley’s art and focusing on systemic violence.
An event where North Dakota’s Supreme Court upheld a lower court’s decision protecting abortion rights in some situations.

chunk-ce5e77442d8a01e24524144690ba295e.entity_name: State Experts, Teachers, Parents, Political Activists
chunk-ce5e77442d8a01e24524144690ba295e.description: A group of state-level experts, educators, parents, and political activists involved in the review process, evaluating academic content and flagging sensitive issues.
A prominent conservative group whose members volunteered to review textbooks and objected to many of them.
An event or situation where finding a company to buy TikTok for billions is proving difficult due to cost and antitrust concerns, among other issues.
An event or situation where rural areas, having turned to colleges for economic support, are now facing challenges due to declining student enrollment.
The Mets’ closer who will miss the season after injuring his right knee at the World Baseball Classic.
